definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: Flexible bronchoscope diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 兒童支原體肺炎的纖維支氣管鏡診治研究。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of KeAn buccal tablets in treating childrens MP pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察咳安含片治療小兒支原體肺炎的臨牀作用。

sentences.english: Moreover, in some cases without urethritis who urethra can be found in Mycoplasma.
sentences.chinese: 而且，有時在無尿道炎者尿道中也可檢出支原體。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to new attenuated M. bovis bacteria strains.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及牛支原體的新的減毒株。

sentences.english: The genital tract mycoplasma infection is one of the sexually diseases.
sentences.chinese: 生殖道支原體感染是一種性傳播疾病。

sentences.english: It was necessary to perform drug sensitivity test before chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 在進行治療前做支原體藥敏試驗很有必要。

sentences.english: Two common sexually transmitted infections are chlamydia and gonorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 兩種常見的性傳播感染是衣原體和支原體。

sentences.english: Causes the NGU pathogen mainly for the blister mantle bacteria reconciliation urine mycoplasma.
sentences.chinese: 引起NGU的病原體主要爲沙眼衣原體和解尿支原體。

sentences.english: Mycoplasma mainly exists in human and animal sinus tract mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 支原體主要存在於人和動物的腔道粘膜。

sentences.english: It was found that the Mycoplasma remained viable in the sand for eight months after the sand was moved.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現，八個月後沙子中仍然有支原體存在。

sentences.english: In addition also has pathogen infections and so on mycoplasma.
sentences.chinese: 此外還有支原體等病原體感染。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the situation of anxiety and depression in male Tibetan with mycoplasmal infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解藏族男性支原體感染患者焦慮與抑制的狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical effect of Azithromycin in treating child mycoplasma pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究阿奇黴素治療兒童支原體肺炎的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Pathogenicity is the important factor that mycoplasma infection need treatment.
sentences.chinese: 具有致病性，是支原體感染需要治療的重要條件。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mycoplasma is one of the main pathogenic bacteria that can cause NGU.
sentences.chinese: 結論支原體是引起NGU的主要病原菌之一。

sentences.english: Methods Drug sensitive detection was made to 125 strains of urealyticum ureaplasma.
sentences.chinese: 方法對125株解脲支原體進行藥敏檢測。
